name: fefade
description: A flexible UI library for modern web development.

scripts.build:all: npm run build:core && npm run build:svelte && npm run build:react && npm run build:vue
scripts.release:core:patch: npm run build:core && npm version patch -w @fefade/core --no-git-tag-version && git add packages/core && git commit -m "chore(release): bump version core" && git tag core-v$(node -p "require('./packages/core/package.json').version") && npm run git:push
scripts.release:svelte:patch: npm run build:svelte && npm version patch -w @fefade/svelte --no-git-tag-version && git add packages/svelte && git commit -m "chore(release): bump version svelte" && git tag svelte-v$(node -p "require('./packages/svelte/package.json').version") && npm run git:push
scripts.release:react:patch: npm run build:react && npm version patch -w @fefade/react --no-git-tag-version && git add packages/react && git commit -m "chore(release): bump version react" && git tag react-v$(node -p "require('./packages/react/package.json').version") && npm run git:push
scripts.release:vue:patch: npm run build:vue && npm version patch -w @fefade/vue --no-git-tag-version && git add packages/vue && git commit -m "chore(release): bump version vue" && git tag vue-v$(node -p "require('./packages/vue/package.json').version") && npm run git:push
